customer_message: I followed the instructions in https://help.tailwindapp.com/en/articles/123-instagram-scheduling but my Instagram posts aren't scheduling. They just sit in drafts.
support_messages: Thanks for reaching out! I can see you're trying to schedule Instagram posts. Let me help troubleshoot this.
I've checked your account and I see the issue - your Instagram Business account isn't properly connected to a Facebook Page. Instagram scheduling requires this connection.

customer_message: How do I change my billing plan? I want to upgrade to Pro.
support_messages: I'd be happy to help you upgrade! You can change your plan from Account Settings > Billing, or I can send you a direct link.

conversation_parts.body: How do I change my billing plan? I want to upgrade to Pro.
I'd be happy to help you upgrade! You can change your plan from Account Settings > Billing, or I can send you a direct link.

customer_message: The Pinterest scheduler is showing an error when I try to post to my boards.
support_messages: I'm sorry you're experiencing this issue. Can you tell me what error message you're seeing?
Thanks! That error means Pinterest needs to re-authorize the connection. I'll send you steps to reconnect.
